nodes.asset_description: Centered white rounded-rectangle panel with large corner radii on a periwinkle-blue background. On the panel are playful, outlined science illustrations: near the top center-left a tilted glass beaker containing blue liquid with measurement marks; top-right an angled yellow test tube with a cream stopper and small bubbles; mid-left a pink-and-yellow cylindrical battery showing plus and minus icons; bottom-left a dropper with a pink bulb, beige stem, blue liquid inside and a falling blue droplet; bottom center gray/blue safety goggles with highlights; bottom-right a molecular model of connected spheres in yellow, orange, and light green with thin rods. All drawings have thin dark outlines and flat fills.
